I got Felbourn's LC-37 Download here [https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1hhT1SQsXjZcXByOHdwcUFLSDg](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1hhT1SQsXjZcXByOHdwcUFLSDg)

Got a fix that worked for me ... i made a new install to see if I could get the errors you guys get, and here's what I did to fix it.... delete all he mods you have installed except for KK, start your game And make  new save, quit the game and delete the statics folder in the KK directory, install all the mods you want including<abbr style="border-bottom-width:1px;border-bottom-style:dotted;color:rgb(39,42,52);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:13px;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:normal;line-height:20.8px;text-indent:0px;text-transform:none;white-space:normal;word-spacing:0px;background-color:rgb(255,255,255);" title="Realism Overhaul (mod)"><abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr></abbr>/<abbr style="border-bottom-width:1px;border-bottom-style:dotted;color:rgb(39,42,52);font-family:'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:13px;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;letter-spacing:normal;line-height:20.8px;text-indent:0px;text-transform:none;white-space:normal;word-spacing:0px;background-color:rgb(255,255,255);" title="Real Solar System (mod)"><abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr></abbr>, start the game and you have to use the save that you made on the beginning of this tutorial... that's what fixed it for me
